name: genoise
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of soft cake made from eggs, sugar, and flour, with a small amount of butter: I made a lemon genoise with lemon butter cream on the inside and chocolate ganache on the outside. The genoise sponge is slightly tricky to make.
More examplesFewer examplesThe yule log is a traditional Christmas cake made with genoise and buttercream, shaped and decorated to resemble a log.The traditional way to make genoise cakes is the whipping method.
